text: Eugenio Bersellini (10 June 1936 â€“ 17 September 2017) was an Italian football player and manager. He was born in Borgo Val di Taro, Kingdom of Italy. He was known for playing with Brescia Calcio, Monza and Lecce. He managed Como, Internazionale and Torino. Bersellini died on 17 September 2017 in Prato, Italy of pneumonia at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Italy Category:Footballers from Emilia-Romagna Category:Italian football managers
title: Eugenio Bersellini
